explains: n. 造成妨碍的人（或事物）；阻碍，妨碍
wordGroup: steric hindrance 位阻，位阻现象

sentences.en: They were able to complete their journey without further hindrance.
sentences.cn: 剩下的旅程他们没再受到阻碍。

sentences.en: Note that Apple's public opposition to the government's request is itself a hindrance to mass government intrusion.
sentences.cn: 请注意，苹果公开反对政府的要求本身就是对政府大规模入侵的一种阻碍。

sentences.en: Associating a number as one of the qualities of a specific object is a great hindrance to the development of a true number sense.
sentences.cn: 把数字和一个具体物品的一种属性联系起来，是形成真正的数感的一大障碍。
